text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text: One, two! One, two! And... finish!

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text: Okay, one lap down, another lap to go!

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text: One, two! One, two! One, two!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Even on the final day of Tracen<n>Academy's summer camp,
the<n>hopeful underdog is hard at work.

text_block_list.name: Reporter
text_block_list.text:
Looks like Haru Urara's as bright as<n>ever. Even the
summer sun can't<n>outshine her!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Her fan I met at the scrimmage<n>seems to be writing a piece
on the<n>summer camp. I watch as the giddy<n>reporter
happily snaps pictures.

text_block_list.name: Reporter
text_block_list.text:
I'd love to stay and watch, but I've<n>got another assignment.
I took some<n>great pictures, though, so I'll send<n>them to
you ASAP!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Haru Urara and I train for the rest of<n>the day. At the end, the
exhausted<n>racer comes up to me, eyes full of<n>
expectations.

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text: Huff... puff... I'm beat! But Idid it! I finished the whole run!

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text: Yeah, I bet I'm much faster now!<n>How was my time?!

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text:
Wh-why are you so quiet?! What was<n>my time on that last
lap?!
choice_data_list: You still didn't beat your record...
You still didn't beat your record...

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text: Ohhh! Darn it! Then I'll do one more<n>lap right no—

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Gurgle.

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text:
Ah... Hehe, looks like I worked up<n>more of an appetite than I
thought!

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text:
Mmm! Crepes, cakes, candied<n>carrots... Everything I try is
so good!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Haru Urara and I have come to a local<n>festival, both as a
reward for her hard<n>work and a means to replenish her<n>
energy.

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text:
If there's anything you want to eat,<n>I'll get it for you
lickety-split!

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text: Ehehe, I love festivals! ♪ Thanks for<n>bringing me here!

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text:
Hehehe! ♪ Ah! Look, they've got a<n>ring toss game! Now
THAT brings<n>back memories!

text_block_list.name: Farmer
text_block_list.text: Urara? Is that you?

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text: Oh, hello, Mr. Farmer! Are you having<n>fun too?

text_block_list.name: Farmer
text_block_list.text:
That's my line! You must be taking a<n>break from training.
How was summer<n>camp?

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text: Well... I ran a whooole bunch, so I had<n>a blast!

text_block_list.name: Farmer
text_block_list.text:
I see. Well, that's all that matters! Will<n>I see the results of
your hard work at<n>the next race?

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text:
You bet! I KNOW I'll be taking home<n>the gold this time. You
won't want to<n>miss out!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
After that heartfelt declaration, Haru<n>Urara and I say our
goodbyes to the<n>carrot farmer.
choice_data_list: Shall we call it a day?
Shall we call it a day?

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text:
Um... Hey, would it be okay if we<n>stayed just a liiittle bit
more?

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Together, we return to the moonlit<n>beach.
choice_data_list: Something you want to do here?
Something you want to do here?

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text: I just want to do one more lap before<n>we head home!

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text:
I've worked so hard here, so I want<n>to end on a high note
and get just a<n>teensy bit faster!

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text: So please, time my last lap of the<n>summer!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Haru Urara makes her way to the<n>starting position with a
more serious<n>expression than usual.

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text: Ready when you are! Just give me<n>the signal!
choice_data_list: On your mark... Get set... Go!

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text: One, two! One, two! One, two! One,<n>two!

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text: Finiiish! Huff, puff... How wasthat?! What's my time?!

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text: Ohhh, drat! I thought I beat it for sure!

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text: When we get back, I'm gonna workeven harder! I will get faster andfinally take first place!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Haru Urara's cries of determination<n>echo from the beach to
the ocean<n>horizon. Surely she's feeling<n>frustrated at her
lack of progress.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
I, however, know for a fact that she<n>has improved. In order
to prove it, I<n>take out my phone.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
I show her two of the photos the<n>reporter sent me. One is
from the first<n>time the two met, and the other is<n>from
today's training.

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text: Oh, that's me! But why are you<n>showing me this now?

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text:
Huh?! Wh-what do you mean? N-no<n>one's ever said that
about me before.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Looking at the two photos, it's clear<n>that her running form
has improved.<n>She's running in a much more<n>efficient
way now.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
I explain to her that at this rate, it's<n>only a matter of time
before her speed<n>increases.

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text: Really? Then... does that mean I got<n>better?!

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text: Of course I trust you! But wow! Thatmeans I really am improving!

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text:
And I couldn't have done it without<n>you! I'm so glad you're
my trainer!

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text: I've always known I could win if I putmy mind to it, but now I reallyknow!

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text: And I hope you're ready, 'causeonce we're back at Tracen, I'm givingpractice a hundred and ten percent!
